Class::MOP::Object(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Class::MOP::Object(3)

NAME

Class::MOP::Object - Base class for metaclasses

VERSION

version 2.1202

DESCRIPTION

This class is a very minimal base class for metaclasses.

METHODS

This class provides a few methods which are useful in all metaclasses.
Class::MOP::???->meta
This returns a Class::MOP::Class object.
$metaobject->dump($max_depth)
This method uses Data::Dumper to dump the object. You can pass an optional maximum depth, which will set $Data::Dumper::Maxdepth. The default maximum depth is 1.
$metaclass->throw_error($message)
This method calls Moose::Util::throw_exception internally, with an object of class Moose::Exception::Legacy.
